name: Jutsoo
headline: All your corporate bank accounts connected under one platform
description:
Jutsoo is a modern treasury management platform that helps finance teams work smarter by having efficient, reliable, real-time visibility and control over their financial data across their different banks and bank accounts.

We do this by unifying data from internal systems, integrating directly with banks for your money movements, and reconcile them automatically.

Money movements, reconciliations, cash forecasting, and identifying liquidity trends will be a breeze using us.

founders.name: Mario Gaw, Founder
founders.description: Mario Gaw is the co-founder and CEO of Bananas. Together with Kristian Sinaulan, he wanted to change how people do groceries in today's world where spare time is better spent on quality time with family rather than doing weekly grocery shopping. He has extensive experience in e-commerce from his days in Lazada Indonesia (Rocket Internet venture acquired by Alibaba), payments in helloPay Indonesia (merged with Alipay), and building products like Cashbac (an instant rewards loyalty mobile app).

founders.name: Kristian F H Sinaulan, Founder
founders.description: Kristian Sinaulan is the co-founder and CTO of Bananas. Together with Mario Gaw, he wanted to change how people do groceries in today's world where spare time is better spent on quality time with family rather than doing weekly grocery shopping. He has been building teams and products in several industries ranging from Telcos, E-Commerce, Payments, Loyalty Systems.

# Manage Cash like a Boss**with Jutsoo**
Jutsoo is a modern treasury management platform that helps finance teams work smarter by having efficient, reliable, real-time visibility and control over their financial data across their different banks and bank accounts.
[Schedule a demo](https://www.jutsoo.com/</en/sign-up>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f35353b74a3c73de711d3f/63f38314885a7e339cac2920_hero-image.webp)
No more spending hours on checking, monitoring, and reconciling bank accounts
Trusted By Companies like
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f35353b74a3c73de711d3f/63f38dcbe68771adc7d7aa30_halodoc-logo.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f35353b74a3c73de711d3f/63f38dcb8513891960a50b87_pintu-logo.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f35353b74a3c73de711d3f/63f38dcb5dffb1115c409478_bananas-logo.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f35353b74a3c73de711d3f/63f38dcbb68fbba0cdb30d9f_traveloka-logo.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f35353b74a3c73de711d3f/63f38dcb7ed9f2b01c7d3472_kargo-logo.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f35353b74a3c73de711d3f/63f38dcba511aa0f70af5928_indepay-logo.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f35353b74a3c73de711d3f/63f38dcb1cd7b9228517c6a5_wintermar-logo.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f35353b74a3c73de711d3f/640eef5de4a5b3ce17984a74_home-solution-image.webp)
## Simple yet powerful treasury management for modern teams
01.
### Global Cash Management
Consolidate all your bank accounts data into one platform to have a single reliable view over your cash position easily.Aggregated cash balances and transaction history across multiple bank accounts from multiple banks all in one place real-time.
02.
### Automated Reconciliation
Save hours of daily or weekly reconciliation work from using our automated reconciliation on bank statements against company’s internal records.
03.
### Cash Forecasting
Easy cash forecasting in identifying your liquidity trends based on your historical and expected transactions to manage risks and maximize opportunities.
[Talk to an expert now](https://www.jutsoo.com/</en/sign-up>)
## More Reasons to Get Started with **Jutsoo**
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f35353b74a3c73de711d3f/63f3a18ce3bd0b2c81e03bab_ri_lock-password-line.svg)
### Easy-to-use, Secure, and Reliable
We are obsessed with creating a delightful yet secure and reliable user experience for you and your team every step of the way. Our platform will speak for itself.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f35353b74a3c73de711d3f/63f3a18c178336861c89c727_ri_money-dollar-circle-line.svg)
### Simple, Transparent, Flexible Pricing
We charge software subscription fees personalized for you that easily scales up or down depending on your unique business needs. You do not have to worry about getting access to the latest and greatest updates 24/7. No hidden fees whatsoever.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f35353b74a3c73de711d3f/63f3a18ce02ced17923baf6b_ri_loader-2-fill.svg)
### Built by founders who care
We genuinely care about our customers’ success and take pride in partnering with them at whatever stage their journey is in. We only succeed if our customers do.
[Get started with Jutsoo](https://www.jutsoo.com/</en/sign-up>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f35353b74a3c73de711d3f/640eef7d75d082831f97c292_home-reason-image.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f35353b74a3c73de711d3f/63f3a67f1e8b8050ea4383f7_testi-placeholder-0.webp)

generated_description:
### Jutsoo: Simplifying Treasury Management for Corporates

**Overview**  
Founded in 2021 and part of Y Combinator's W22 batch, Jutsoo is based in Jakarta, Indonesia. With a lean team of 12, the company is on a mission: to connect all corporate bank accounts under one seamless platform. The challenge Jutsoo tackles is simple but profound—financial visibility and control across multiple banks and accounts.

**What They Do**  
Jutsoo offers a modern treasury management platform aimed at helping finance teams streamline their operations. By integrating data from internal systems and connecting directly to banks, they automate money movements and reconciliations, providing real-time visibility into cash positions. This means finance teams can manage cash flow, forecast liquidity, and reduce reconciliation errors with minimal manual oversight.

#### Key Features:
1. **Global Cash Management**: Aggregates accounts for an instant view of total cash and transactions.
2. **Automated Reconciliation**: Saves valuable hours by matching bank statements with internal records automatically.
3. **Cash Forecasting**: Helps predict liquidity trends by analyzing historical data, allowing businesses to prepare for future cash needs.

**Products**  
Jutsoo’s services cover several financial needs:
- Invoicing
- Payments
- Payroll
- Accounting
- Spending Management
- Financing
- Investment Solutions

**Why Choose Jutsoo?**  
- **User-Friendly**: The platform is designed to be intuitive, ensuring teams can navigate it without hassle.
